name: Soldier
descr: You served in an army, militia, or mercenary company. War has shaped you—for better or worse.

data.trait: **Battle Hardened.** You have advantage on saves against being frightened in combat.
data.equipment: A military rank insignia, a trophy from a fallen enemy, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 silver.

name: Scholar
descr: You spent years in libraries and academies, pursuing knowledge above all else.

data.trait: **Researcher.** When you attempt to learn or recall a piece of lore, if you do not know that information, you often know where and from whom you can obtain it.
data.equipment: A bottle of ink, a quill, a small knife, a letter from a dead colleague posing a question you have not yet been able to answer, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 silver.

name: Criminal
descr: You have a history of breaking the law. Whether you've reformed or not is up to you.

data.trait: **Criminal Contact.** You have a reliable and trustworthy contact who acts as your liaison to a network of other criminals.
data.equipment: A crowbar, a set of dark common clothes including a hood, and a belt pouch containing 15 silver.

name: Acolyte
descr: You have spent your life in the service of a temple or religious order.

data.trait: **Shelter of the Faithful.** You can receive free healing and care at temples of your faith, and supporters will provide you with a modest lifestyle.
data.equipment: A holy symbol, a prayer book or wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 silver.

name: Entertainer
descr: You thrive in front of an audience, whether through music, storytelling, acting, or other performance.

data.trait: **By Popular Demand.** You can always find a place to perform. When you perform, you can earn enough for a modest lifestyle.
data.equipment: A musical instrument, the favor of an admirer, a costume, and a belt pouch containing 15 silver.

name: Outlander
descr: You grew up in the wilds, far from civilization and the comforts of town.

data.trait: **Wanderer.** You have an excellent memory for maps and geography, and you can always recall the general layout of terrain and settlements. You can find food and fresh water for yourself and up to five other people each day.
data.equipment: A staff, a hunting trap, a trophy from an animal you killed, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 silver.

name: Noble
descr: You come from a family of wealth and privilege, trained in the ways of high society.

data.trait: **Position of Privilege.** Thanks to your noble birth, people are inclined to think the best of you. You are welcome in high society, and common folk make every effort to accommodate you.
data.equipment: A set of fine clothes, a signet ring, a scroll of pedigree, and a purse containing 25 silver.

name: Guild Artisan
descr: You are a member of an artisan's guild, skilled in a particular craft.

data.trait: **Guild Membership.** Your guild offers lodging and food if necessary, and serves as a powerful network of contacts who can provide information and support.
data.equipment: A set of artisan's tools, a letter of introduction from your guild, a set of traveler's clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 silver.

name: Hermit
descr: You lived in seclusion—either in a sheltered community or entirely alone—for a formative part of your life.

data.trait: **Discovery.** The quiet seclusion of your extended hermitage gave you access to a unique and powerful discovery—a truth about the cosmos, the gods, or some other significant secret.
data.equipment: A scroll case stuffed full of notes from your studies, a winter blanket, a set of common clothes, an herbalism kit, and 5 silver.

name: Sailor
descr: You spent years aboard a ship, learning the ways of the sea.

data.trait: **Ship's Passage.** When you need to, you can secure free passage on a sailing ship for yourself and your adventuring companions in exchange for working as crew.
data.equipment: A belaying pin (club), 50 feet of silk rope, a lucky charm, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 silver.
